title: EastEnders spoilers: Stuart issues a dark threat over Ben and Ian
text:
Stuart Highway (Ricky Champ) shows that he means business tonight in EastEnders as he issues a dark threat to Kathy Beale (Gillian Taylforth) as revenge for her part in Rainie Branning (Tanya Franks) being arrested.

With Rainie struggling with addiction and Kathy putting temptation in her path, Stuart has already been violent with Kathy as he was disgusted by her actions. With Rainie struggling with her demons, she ended up scoring drugs while looking after Abi and gave herself the wake up call that she needs help.

In order to get herself arrested and protect Stuart from having to deal with her, Rainie called the police and then punched Kathy in full view of them. As she was driven away, she told Stuart she needed to get help and pledged her love for him.

Stuart is still struggling without her and blames Kathy for what has happened so tonight, he pays her a visit and tells her that he is going to make her sorry by hurting Ben (Max Bowden) and Ian (Adam Woodyatt) – and he certainly means it.

Advertisement

Advertisement

However as he calms down, his temper dissipates and he and Kathy end up having a heart to heart. He tells Kathy how people like him and Rainie will constantly be judged by others due to their addictions and Kathy can sympathise with how he is feeling.

While it hasn’t officially been confirmed that Rainie will return to the show, Metro.co.uk understands that this isn’t the last that viewers have seen of her and Tanya Franks recently confirmed that there was still plenty to explore with Rainie and Stuart’s complex relationship.

Despite both characters having massive flaws, the audience have taken to their relationship as their genuine love for one another has taken everyone – including themselves – by surprise. Can Stuart help Rainie back onto the straight and narrow?

EastEnders continues on Friday 18th October at 8:30pm on BBC One.

Advertisement Advertisement
description: He tells Kathy he means business.
